content: **from designer ** *the pattern is for kids 4-10 years-old the ribbed fabric is clingy and stretchy at the same time which is perfect to fit a wide range of foot sizes the pattern is simple and a good way to start knitting socks if you haven t tried before these will go quickly and will teach you the basics of sock knitting in no time flat * **correction ** gusset round 1 needle 1 knit needle 2 continue in rib pattern k3 p1 needle 3 knit
